Bag O' Links - 6/4/2009 Elad Meidar

06 Apr 2009

  • Obie Fernandez on Alex Payne’s (Twitter) new approach – I agree that rails is not a good solution for everything, and you shouldn’t be using a hammer to solve all your problems… but the attitude of Mr. Payne is simply.. funny.
  • Who’s the blame? – another Twitter basher.. for a good reason.
  • And on the other hand… – A different point of view on that same matter.
  • Twitter Gem rebirth – a “slimmer” twitter gem.
  • StateMachine 0.7 – Nice new features.
  • Testing Capistrano With Cucumber – Personally, there’s a limit to the testing i am willing to approve, but it’s here if i’ll ever need it.
